sentence: Global IT services provider, Accenture plcACN continues to expand its foothold in Brazil to tap the opportunities in the region.
Recently, the company announced that it will add 1,000 positions at its delivery center in Brazil's northeast city of Recife by 2017.
Such a significant addition to its workforce will help it to provide better services in Brazil.
It already offers innovative application services in Sao Paulo, Belo Horizonte, Brasilia, Belo Horizonte and Rio de Janeiro to name a few.

Recife is the largest metropolitan area in the Northeast Region of Brazil and serves as a hub for a range of industries, including finance, health, telecommunications, consumer goods, natural resources, mining, energy and automotive.

The delivery centers are expected to support clients by providing personnel with enhanced network visibility, innovative tools for consumer self-help and field technicians, all of which are aimed at enhancing customer service.
This apart, Accenture recently announced the acquisition of Tquila UK - one of the leading independent consulting services providers of salesforce.com Inc. CRM - in Europe.
However, the financial terms of the transaction have not been disclosed.
The move is expected to be a part of Accenture's strategy of strengthening its position across Europe as a provider of Salesforce services and cloud implementations.
We are encouraged by Accenture's strategy of growing through acquisitions.
However, we remain slightly cautious on the stock given its modest third-quarter fiscal 2015 outlook.
Also, increasing competition from Cognizant Technology Solutions Corp. CTSH and International Business Machines Corporation IBM and economic concerns in several parts of the world may dampen growth.
